item.title: About
item.description:
Experienced SAP Consultant and Founder of Web3Go with a strong background in technology and international business.

Location: Singapore, Singapore, UTC+8

Website | Email | LinkedIn

About Link to heading

Experienced SAP Consultant with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in SAP Fiori, UI5, Python, and Linux. Has worked internationally in India, China, and Germany, bringing a diverse cultural perspective to projects. Also experienced in marketing and product management. PMP certified.
